channel.title: Responding via Email
channel.description: It appears that I can't just do a reply all to the email I get and have it post to the right discussion thread in here. Is that correct or have I mucked up something on my end?

item.title: Responding via Email
item.dc:creator: peterkaminski
item.description:
Hi Gene,

Responding via email is just not set up yet – it’s one of the set-up steps we haven’t gotten to yet. We should get to it later this week.

Sorry for the inconvenience in the meantime!

Read full topic
